faq.question: What is WebbScraper?
faq.answer: A web scraper is a program or tool that automatically extracts data from websites. It works by systematically navigating a website, locating and extracting specific data, such as text, images, or other media, and saving it in a structured format such as a txt, CSV or JSON file.

faq.question: Why use WebbScraper?
faq.answer:
WebbScraper can extract valuable keyword data from competitor websites, search engine results pages (SERPs), and industry forums. This data can help you identify relevant keywords to target in your own content.
Scraping competitor backlinks can provide insights into their link-building strategies and identify potential opportunities for you to acquire high-quality backlinks.

faq.question: What means Enter URL
faq.answer: You can enter an url to web scrap it, you can do it with https:// or without it.

faq.question: What means Enter Data
faq.answer: You can enter a html tag that you would like web scrap as h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, img, html, body, head, script and any other html tag, make sure you enter it without <>.
